column1: #text=This morning I rode a public bus to college .
#text=Before I left my house , I checked the bus schedule so I would know what time the bus was meant to arrive .
#text=I then left my house and walked to the bus stop right outside my house .
#text=I then sat on the bench next to an old man and waited for the bus to arrive .
#text=While I waited , I chatted with the old man .
#text=When the bus arrived , I let the old man get on in front of me .
#text=I then climbed on board the bus , paid the bus driver the bus fare , and the bus driver said '' `` Good morning '' '' as he handed me my ticket .
#text=Holding onto my ticket , I took a seat near the front of the bus .
#text=I stared out the window throughout the bus journey , just enjoying the view .
#text=When my stop was coming up , I pressed the button to let the bus driver know to stop the bus .
#text=He stopped at my stop and I stood up and got off the bus , thanking the bus driver before I exited .
